website_summaries.verdict: Slide style leather sandals with full grain leather uppers.
pros: A comfortable fit paired with the slide style make these ideal for casual wear
When you need a sandal you can wear all summer, these are a good choice for a slightly higher price
cons: Some customers noted that stitching was of low quality

customer_reviews.title: somewhat disapointing
customer_reviews.text: i have worn clark's for years. this is the 1st pair i've purchased that did not fit as expected. they are long enough the they are too wide and don't hug the foot well. also the 1st time i've ever purchased clark's that i couldn't return them even after wearing them. "clark" guarentees there shoes for life and will always take a return even if worn for long periods of time. so disapointed that i can't return them to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Cristine M. Shuldberg

customer_reviews.title: I can't pry these off husband's feet
customer_reviews.text: In the days after Labor Day, I had to hide these from my husband because they were his go to shoes. He thinks they are among the most comfortable shoes he's owned. I had tried to replace his Cole Haan (with Nike Air soles) woven sandals this year and couldn't find anything. I don't know if Cole Haan stopped making sandals or what. Their loss. We spent our money (and 1/3 the cost) with Clark's. Of course, the style factor isn't as high. Clark's are more rugged looking. But these meet most of my husband's needs, these are fine...
customer_reviews.author: scribblindemon

customer_reviews.title: Great turn around time, but ...
customer_reviews.text: The sandals have a very funky fit. Usually wear a 10.5D so an 11D was ordered as have owned many fine Clarks products. Sandal fits fine on the foot but there is a significant amount of extra toe room for some.reason and it juts out in front quite a lot. Kind of frumpy looking, too, if I'm honest , so they're being returned. As mentioned, merchant did well with the order getting here. Not contacted about return for full credit.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanFlyer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement pair, smaller size, still too large!
customer_reviews.text: I generally wear 8.5 to 9.0 depending. My left foot is nearly 9 and my right 8.5. I ordered 9's which turned out huge on both feet. The replacement 8's are fine on the left but still way too large on the right. As they are very nicely made and otherwise very comfortable I will keep them and visit a shoe repair shop to see what can be done to make the right fit better. The cost of shipping to and from is too much to return or continue replacing.
customer_reviews.author: KenP

customer_reviews.title: Hideous pleather
customer_reviews.text: Immediately hated these. Online the image looks like aged, somewhat distressed leather. In reality, they have all the appeal of a 60s tinsel christmas tree. The fake leather is a hideous yellow-brown, both lighter and more yellow than as shown in the image, with none of the distressed look. And they were about 1/2 size too small even though I always wear an 11 for everything else and rarely have had issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Erat

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these because the black Vionics were unavailable. These ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these because the black Vionics were unavailable. These shoes do not fit my husbands feet as well as the Vionics did. He states it's hard to get his feet up to the top and to stay there as he has narrow feet. He barely wears them and they were expensive!
customer_reviews.author: MissyG

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: My old sandals wore out and I was looking for a replacement. Could not find the old ones, which I liked. These sandals are comfortable, fit well and seem to be durable. Hopefully they will last two summers.
customer_reviews.author: JDBOB

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father-in-law who loves Clark's. Being a Clark's fan myself I had no problem paying a little extra for a sandals. It fits as expected, and the pictures are true to the product. He loves it so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: A great looking shoe and typical Clarks quality
customer_reviews.text: I usually get away with 10s when 9.5 EEs are not available. These didn't work. They were going to be too long and the width just wasn't there. A great looking shoe and typical Clarks quality.
customer_reviews.author: F. Fahrner

customer_reviews.title: delightful Clark sandal foot wear
customer_reviews.text: what a nice pair of Clark's sandals. they are well made and fit perfectly - I usually am a size 11.5 but for these got a half size larger the 12d. they are very comfortable and I wear them everywhere indoors..
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: not what they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: have worn clarks loved the shoes in the past , yes past. after six weeks of occasional use they started pulling apart at the seams ..Like I said wore clarks for twenty years but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Good leather slides for men
customer_reviews.text: I am a 9 1/2 D and they fit fine for me. If you are a9 nine then too big and a 10 then maybe okay. They are comfortable and reasonable and hard to find leather slides like this..
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Brand,  Crummy Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit as expected. Only had great experiences with Clarks in the past, but these were by far the worst. Didn't fit snugly on the foot and the design caused a blister on my right heel. Once that happened they went back in the box and I printed out the return label.
customer_reviews.author: DeanMerrill2000

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great and comfortable sandal. First time wearing Clark products. Good quality. I wear 10 1/2. Did not come in 1/2 size so I chose an 11. No problem. Still a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: peaches

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The color is very misleading and I was disappointed with the fit so I don't rate it very high. Also won't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: The sandals came unstitched on the top within 3 weeks. I was able to get them repaired locally. I will not buy Clark again.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Overpriced, Expendable!
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, it is comfortable, BUT if you use it every day, it will start to fall apart in less than a month. It is really overpriced. Please don`t waste your money, for this price you better look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: exellente
customer_reviews.text: excellent product its what i was looking for. i will recommend to friend and family fit perfect and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, fits true to size and has a rich ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these sandals. Very comfortable, fits true to size and has a rich leather feel and look.
customer_reviews.author: Shelzii

customer_reviews.title: You Can't Beat Quality
customer_reviews.text: Clarks is really a good brand. The quality never disappoints you and the fit is great. The details they go into for comfort are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals!! Like every Clarks shoe I've owned, they are very comfortable, very well made, and long lasting. I have ordered a new pair only because my first pair are several years old, but might not make it through the upcoming summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The cheapest shoes, they broke after wearing then twice for a very short time, didn't even wear the soles.. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Tancredi

customer_reviews.title: Clark's never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Every Clark's shoe I buy is the most comfortable one I've had, until I buy the next one...
customer_reviews.author: MDaytona

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: tried to send for a bigger pair but did not have the option.
customer_reviews.author: Benn Tennin

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable sandals, but a little dull-looking
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, and seem durable so far, but they are neither as comfortable nor as good-looking as a similar pair of Ecco sandals that I wore for the last 8 years, until they started to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory T. Regaignon

customer_reviews.title: so very happy I found
customer_reviews.text: They are to replace a previous pair I wore out, so very happy I found them
customer_reviews.author: P.K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice distinctive look and color
customer_reviews.text: Just as I like and pictured, comfortable and goes with everything on a nice day. Will do business again and shipping was super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe/sandals that can be worn all day. Feels like I'm walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: Casualkul

customer_reviews.title: Product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit is to scale; product came promptly - even w/o any expedited delivery; actual sandal looked just as described.
customer_reviews.author: car4cap

customer_reviews.title: Good Sandal
customer_reviews.text: The sandal was a tad big on my husband's foot but he is wearing them so they are good and I can't tell you how many times I was looking for shoes for him. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rabbiner

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, most comfortable, and most durable sandals I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: IronSky

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but no fit.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are nice and shipping was fast, But I am going to return them if it don't cost a fortune to do so. Don't understand why some shoe orders have free return and some don't.......Anyway I wish they would have fit..... I have not had much luck with shoe orders online when it comes to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Eversole

customer_reviews.title: very confortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to use them indore and he is very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Stitching no good!
customer_reviews.text: On the first day of wearing the stitches came off on the right side! Inferior product! Does not even look genuine! Highly disappointed. Did not expect that from the Clarks brand
customer_reviews.author: Gursham Ceromain

customer_reviews.title: Life is good...
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied with this sandal, and especially happy with your service.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Eik

customer_reviews.title: Clark sandals works out good for me and the size is on time
customer_reviews.text: Clark sandals works out good for me and the size is on time. I wear them with my khacki shorts when out and casual.
customer_reviews.author: Joyner Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Super Sandals
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are just what I expected. They look super and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Eldone Truex

customer_reviews.title: poor, you have no quality control
customer_reviews.text: poor,you have no quality control,i know no storethat would put merchandise like this on there shelfs.the sandal are scuffed and scared,i don't think think there new.i am going to return the sandal.please look into it .jerry r white
customer_reviews.author: jerry r white

customer_reviews.title: Sub standard
customer_reviews.text: The sandal burst after 2 wears, I had to take it to the shoe maker to have it fixed. I messaged the seller about it and they didn't even have the common courtesy to respond. I've owned many Clarks products, but this one looks and feels sub standard.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them. They look a little cheap to me for Clark's. But very lightweight and stylish
customer_reviews.author: Liz Field

customer_reviews.title: It's just OK
customer_reviews.text: It fits a little loose on the top and the footbed is not that comfortable. After wearing it for a few days, it compresses in the heel and it feels like you're standing on a hard surface. Seller would not allow a return for shoes that had been worn, no matter how short. How are you supposed to try out a shoe without wearing it? Wont' be buying from that seller ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Durbin

customer_reviews.title: stitching is terrible
customer_reviews.text: stitching is terrible inside and out, very poor quality for clarks.. Im disappointing, especially being of clarks reputation. dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Jose G.

customer_reviews.title: The Shoes look very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift not yet given. The Shoes look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Cissell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband - he says it's very comfortable and wears them ALL the time
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the best thank you is to see them used.
customer_reviews.author: susan harris

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after two months
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these. Pretty low quality product for Clarks. They fell apart after two months of light use. The middle part got unsewed. I had worn them maybe 10-15 times total.
customer_reviews.author: Zel H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Stylish looking. My husband loves it!! Fast Shipping too. I wish they had half sizes available, but size 9 was fine too
customer_reviews.author: hae

customer_reviews.title: This sandal did not fit as expected so we returned ...
customer_reviews.text: This sandal did not fit as expected so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K Holsapple

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my instep,and I ordered a size larger to take care of that.
customer_reviews.author: rickyeharris

customer_reviews.title: Well made, quality shoe received very quickly!
customer_reviews.text: This Clarks mens sandal arrived quickly. It was packed well and was an excellent quality shoe. My husband is usually a 10.5 but an 11 will work if we have to. This shoe in 11 runs quite large. I hope to re-order it in a 10 and it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci

customer_reviews.title: color perfect, size correct
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and size is actual sizing Clarks shoes are the best in quality.......last a long time with wear Clarks shoes are great for men or women
customer_reviews.author: carol drollinger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: arrived when they said they would not to shabby when it comes by our mail system
customer_reviews.author: don macleod

customer_reviews.title: stitching no good
customer_reviews.text: it fits ok but the problem is that i wear it only for two days and the stitches start coming off
customer_reviews.author: aitmourhit mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for a better sandal
customer_reviews.text: My husband just loves them, great for beach or just hanging out. He has bad knees but has little discomfort when wearing Clarks
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle M Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. After one day of use the sandal ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. After one day of use the sandal broke!!
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Men's Swing Around Wedge Sandal,Tan,10 M US
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not exactly what I expected, from a Clark product. Everything made in China is nothing but junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Stacer

customer_reviews.title: Hi
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I want you to give me size 10. I already send the old one and I want the same color thank you
customer_reviews.author: ali

product_meta.title: Clarks Men's Swing Around Sandal
product_meta.description: Clarks has been in business for over 100 years making very fine men's dress shoes in a variety of styles. Featuring a wide range of top-quality components, Clarks gives you the options you desire in the quality you demand.
feature_bullets: Full grain leather uppers are soft and flexible
Soft fabric linings buffer the foot
Rubber outsole is durable and flexible
